title: Sidewall sample and border
description: Stripe with attached border, three moired stripes in grey, surrounded by wide stripe of grey, light blue, medium blue, dark blue. Border: festoon shaped with garlands of blue roses, highlighted in gold, trophy hanging from leaf-twist molding.
